text: Gei Dimaadua di godou God ga haga maluagina goodou i nia mee huogodoo ala e hai go goodou gi godou lima, gaa hai gi dogologo godou hagadili, gaa hai nia dama o godou kau mono siibi gii logo, ga haga maluagina goodou gi nia huwa o godou gelegele. Dimaadua ga tenetene labelaa adu gi goodou, ga haga maluagina goodou, be dana hai nogo haga maluagina godou maadua mmaadua.
